hooks.prompt: Review the work completed. If you learned anything new about this project's patterns, bugs, or architecture that should be documented: 1) Read the CLAUDE.md file, 2) Add a concise bullet point under '### Lessons Learned' section (create it if it doesn't exist), 3) Save the file. Then ALWAYS respond with valid JSON: {"ok": true, "reason": "brief summary of what was done or if nothing new to document"}. If there was an error, respond: {"ok": false, "reason": "error description"}. Do not include any text outside the JSON.
